extensionLocale.description: Used to check which locale is loaded, as it might be different from @@ui_locale.

extensionDescription.message: Выделите текст на любой веб-странице, и есть компьютер читать вслух для вас, просто нажав на кнопку Talkie.

noTextSelectedMessage.message: Пожалуйста, выберите нужный текст на сайте первым!

noVoiceForLanguageDetectedMessage.message: Sorry, no available voice language detected for the selected text.
noVoiceForLanguageDetectedMessage.description: This is a fallback message. For this reason it is always in English.

noVoiceForLanguageDetectedMessageLanguag.description: This is a fallback message. For this reason it is always in English.
